history.proof: intros. apply eq_sym. apply sym_eq. qsimpl use: div_prop. qsimpl use: divides_rem_eq,div_prop. qsimpl use: divides_rem_eq,div_prop. qsimpl use: divides_rem_eq,div_prop. sauto l: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment p, q : nat H : q < p H0 : divides p q Unable to unify "div ?M1532 p = q" with "q = 0".

In environment H1 : forall q p n r : nat, q = n * p + r -> r < p -> div q p = n p, x : nat H : x * p < p H0 : forall q p : nat, divides p q -> rem q p = 0 Unable to unify "rem ?M2055 ?M2056 = 0" with "x * p = 0".
The reference H3 was not found in the current environment.

In environment H4 : forall q p n r : nat, q = n * p + r -> r < p -> div q p = n p, x : nat H : x * p < p H0 : forall q p : nat, rem q p = 0 -> divides p q H1 : forall q p : nat, divides p q -> rem q p = 0 Unable to unify "div ?M2941 ?M2942 = ?M2943" with "x * p = 0".

original: intros q p H1 H2. intros H3 H4. apply eq_sym. apply sym_eq. apply div_prop with (n:=q) (p:=p) (r:=0). + apply divides_rem_eq. apply H3. + apply lt_le in H4. apply H4.
